description: This file defines a Flutter widget for creating and submitting a new event, including form handling, date/time picking, and integrating with a provider for state management.

classes.name: EventFormPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget providing a form interface for creating new events.

classes.name: _EventFormPageState
classes.description: State class managing the form's internal state, including controllers, selected date/time, and form actions.

methods.name: _pickDateTime
methods.description: Handles user interaction for selecting date and time asynchronously, updating internal state.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Validates the form, creates an Event object, adds it to the provider, and navigates back.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, rendering the form UI with controllers and interaction handlers.
